title: PromptCL: Improving Event Representation via Prompt Template and Contrastive Learning
venue: Natural Language Processing and Chinese Computing

tldr.text: PromptCL is presented, a novel framework for event representation learning that effectively elicits the capabilities of PLMs to comprehensively capture the semantics of short event texts and proposes Subject-Predicate-Object word order and Event-oriented Masked Language Modeling (EventMLM) to train PLMs to understand the relationships between event components.
